agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not applicable or ready for this type of booking or its current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter or paste custom agreement terms here. These will override the default terms for this specific agreement.
editTermsNote: Note: These terms will only apply to this specific agreement. Standard terms will be used if this field is left empty.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Oromia Education and Training Center, Adama, Ethiopia
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment Terms: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified in writing by Oromia Education Training Center (OETC).
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event date will incur a 50% cancellation fee. Cancellations less than 48 hours prior will incur a 100% fee.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: The Client agrees to use the facility solely for the purpose stated in the booking and shall not cause any damage to the property. Any damages will be billed to the Client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. OETC is not responsible for any loss or damage to personal property of the Client or their attendees.
agreementNotApplicable: An agreement is not applicable for this booking category.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing or has not been sent by the administrator.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility booking history and upcoming reservations.
noBookingsFound: You haven't made any bookings yet.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: Signed agreement confirmed and uploaded successfully.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: There was an error uploading your signed agreement. Please try again or contact support.
agreementPreparationPending: Agreement is being prepared by admin.
registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently awaiting approval from our administrators. You will receive an email notification once it's reviewed. Thank you for your patience.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration was not approved at this time. Please check your email for more details or contact our support team.
contactSupportForAssistance: If you believe this is an error, please contact support for assistance.
statusUnknownMessage: There was an issue determining your account's approval status. Please try again later or contact support.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to access this dashboard.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
myDormitoryDescription: Enter your phone number used during booking to check the status of your approved dormitory reservations.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings.
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
individualUserNote: Individual users looking for dormitories can book directly. No registration needed.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference when making the transfer. Then, send a screenshot of your payment confirmation to the Telegram bot.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please use the bank details below to make your payment via bank transfer.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment, please send a screenshot of your transaction receipt to our Telegram bot {botUsername}. Mention your phone number ({phoneNumber}) or Booking ID for quick verification.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: Our admin team will verify your payment and update your booking status.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for Telegram payment verification.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This phone number can be used for Telegram payment verification (optional).
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking is confirmed once payment proof is sent via Telegram and verified by our admin.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your request! Your facility booking is now pending administrative approval. We'll review it shortly and get back to you.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Please check the details below.
errorFetchingBookingDetails: Error fetching booking details. Please try again or contact support.
missingBookingId: Booking ID is missing from the request.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please go back or contact support.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is unavailable for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Could not find {itemName} in our records. Please check the selection.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently marked as unavailable by administration and cannot be booked.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
noSectionsSelectedOrFound: No sections were selected or items could not be loaded. Please go back and select sections to book.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: An error occurred while calculating the total cost (NaN). Please check item prices or contact support.
verifyOnTelegramUsing: Verify payment on Telegram using guest's phone
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range above to view dormitories available during that period.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory more than once for the same start day with the same phone number.
warningDatabaseConfigNeeded: Warning: Database configuration might be needed for optimal performance.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A check for duplicate bookings was skipped due to a database configuration. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure you haven't booked already for this date. If this message persists, contact admin.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to prevent duplicate bookings. Please contact the site administrator. Your booking cannot be processed at this time.
networkRequestFailedError: Network request failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page for submitting payment proof is no longer in use. Please follow the instructions provided on the payment details page or booking confirmation page to submit your payment proof via Telegram.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Use these details for payment verification and reference.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: Ensure guests use their Booking ID as reference for bank transfers.
